db:info.db:title: Testing QDoc's link command
db:info.db:titleabbrev: A test project for QDoc build artifacts

db:abstract.db:para: This is a page for testing QDoc's link command.

db:section.db:title: Link targets
db:section.db:para: Valid parameters for the link command (\l) are page and section titles, targets defined with \target or \keyword commands, and API reference keywords (types, methods, namespaces, and so on).
